name: Kwame Asante
description: Kwame Asante, a 60-year-old creative thinker from Ghana, values formal communication, particularly when it comes to personal matters like health. Despite having a limited previous experience with technology, his intermediate skills and athletic lifestyle keep him engaged in various activities. Today, he is urgently looking to refill his prescription, demonstrating his detailed nature and risk-taking personality, as he navigates this task with adaptability and a sense of urgency from the comfort of his home.
